name: Sweet potato Pimento
description: This high-fiber, healthified Sweet Potato Pimento dish is a perfect example of a healthy recipe that doesn't compromise on taste. Packed with the goodness of sweet potatoes, enhanced with the flavor of red capsicum, and a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese, this dish is bound to be a delightful addition to your meal plan.

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and cut the sweet potato into cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine sweet potato cubes, diced red capsicum, and unsalted butter.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the mixture to a baking tray and bake for 25 minutes or until the sweet potatoes are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the oven and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
